title: Need help with a support question
body: I want to start off, I am not trying to blame anyone for any of my games, I am doing the complete opposite, I blame myself all the time. My question is, if my adc is on tilt or is just doing the same mistake over and over, what should I say or do to help them out. I just want to know everything about my role so I can keep improving :) <3 please respond if anyone knows how to help this situation.
